languages.text: "О, это редкое, штучное изделие. Заказано лично господином Беллардо двенадцать лет назад! Основная функция этого сервитора — уборка дома, спален, прихожих, отхожих мест. Согласно пожеланиям господина Беллардо, у него полностью искоренена свобода воли, уничтожены участки мозга, отвечающие за удовольствие... но в значительной мере сохранены память и сознание!"

"Oh, this is a rare, one-of-a-kind unit! Commissioned personally by Master Bellardo twelve years ago! The main function of this servitor is cleaning the house, bedrooms, vestibules, bathrooms... In accordance with Master Bellardo's wishes, its free will was completely eradicated, and the parts of its brain that regulated pleasure responses were destroyed... but to a large extent, its memory and awareness were preserved!"

languages.text: “噢！这可是个罕见的，独一无二的机仆！它是十二年前由贝拉多大师亲自委托制造的！这个机仆的主要功能是清洁房屋、卧室、前庭、浴室……根据贝拉多大师的意愿，它的自由意志被完全消除，大脑中调节快乐反馈的部分也被破坏……但它的记忆与意识却在很大程度上得到了保留！”
languages.original_text: "Oh, this is a rare, one-of-a-kind unit! Commissioned personally by Master Bellardo twelve years ago! The main function of this servitor is cleaning the house, bedrooms, vestibules, bathrooms... In accordance with Master Bellardo's wishes, its free will was completely eradicated, and the parts of its brain that regulated pleasure responses were destroyed... but to a large extent, its memory and awareness were preserved!"

traits.locale_text: “噢！这可是个罕见的，独一无二的奴工！它是十二年前由贝拉多大师亲自委托制造的！这个奴工的主要功能是清洁房屋、卧室、前庭、浴室……根据贝拉多大师的意愿，它的自由意志被完全消除，大脑中调节快乐反馈的部分也被破坏……但它的记忆与意识却在很大程度上得到了保留！”

languages.text: «¡Oh, esta es una unidad única! ¡Encargada personalmente por el maestro Bellardo hace doce años! La función principal de este servidor es limpiar la casa, los dormitorios, los vestíbulos, los baños... de acuerdo con los deseos del maestro Bellardo, se erradicó por completo su libre albedrío y las partes de su cerebro que regulan el placer se inutilizaron... ¡pero, en su mayoría, se preservaron sus recuerdos y su consciencia!».
languages.original_text: "Oh, this is a rare, one-of-a-kind unit! Commissioned personally by Master Bellardo twelve years ago! The main function of this servitor is cleaning the house, bedrooms, vestibules, bathrooms... In accordance with Master Bellardo's wishes, its free will was completely eradicated, and the parts of its brain that regulated pleasure responses were destroyed... but to a large extent, its memory and awareness were preserved!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, esta es una unidad única! ¡Encargada personalmente por el maestro Bellardo hace doce años! La función principal de este servidor es limpiar la casa, los dormitorios, los vestíbulos, los baños... de acuerdo con los deseos del maestro Bellardo, se erradicó por completo su libre albedrío y las partes de su cerebro que regulan el placer se inutilizaron... ¡pero, en su mayoría, se preservaron sus recuerdos y su consciencia!».

languages.text: 「いやはや、これは大層珍しい機体ですよ！12年前にマスター・ベラルドが直々に依頼されたものです！このサーヴィターの主な仕事は家、寝室、前庭、浴室の掃除のようです…マスター・ベラルドの意向により自由意志は完全に抹殺され、脳の快楽反応を司る部分も破壊されています…しかし、記憶と意識はかなり保たれていますね！」
languages.original_text: "Oh, this is a rare, one-of-a-kind unit! Commissioned personally by Master Bellardo twelve years ago! The main function of this servitor is cleaning the house, bedrooms, vestibules, bathrooms... In accordance with Master Bellardo's wishes, its free will was completely eradicated, and the parts of its brain that regulated pleasure responses were destroyed... but to a large extent, its memory and awareness were preserved!"

traits.locale_text: 「いやはや、これは大層珍しい機体ですよ！12年前にマスター・ベラルドが直々に依頼されたものです！このサーヴィターの主な仕事は家、寝室、前庭、浴室の掃除のようです…マスター・ベラルドの意向により自由意志は完全に抹殺され、脳の快楽反応を司る部分も破壊されています…しかし、記憶と意識はかなり保たれていますね！」

languages.text: "Oh, das ist eine seltene, einzigartige Einheit! Von Meister Bellardo selbst vor zwölf Jahren in Auftrag gegeben! Die Hauptfunktion dieses Servitor sind Reinigungsarbeiten im Haus – Schlafzimmer, Gänge, Badezimmer ... Gemäß Meister Bellardos Wunsch wurde sein freier Wille komplett gelöscht und die Teile seines Gehirns zerstört, die positive Reaktionen reguliert haben ... aber Gedächtnis und Bewusstsein wurden größtenteils bewahrt!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, this is a rare, one-of-a-kind unit! Commissioned personally by Master Bellardo twelve years ago! The main function of this servitor is cleaning the house, bedrooms, vestibules, bathrooms... In accordance with Master Bellardo's wishes, its free will was completely eradicated, and the parts of its brain that regulated pleasure responses were destroyed... but to a large extent, its memory and awareness were preserved!"

Die Hauptfunktion dieses Servitor sind Reinigungsarbeiten im Haus – Schlafzimmer, Gänge, Badezimmer ... Gemäß Meister Bellardos Wunsch wurde sein freier Wille komplett gelöscht und die Teile seines Gehirns zerstört, die positive Reaktionen reguliert haben ... aber Gedächtnis und Bewusstsein wurden größtenteils bewahrt!"

languages.text: « Oh, il s'agit d'une unité extrêmement rare, et même unique ! Commandée par maître Bellardo lui-même il y a douze ans ! Ce servitor a pour tâche le ménage des chambres, des vestibules, des salles de bain... Conformément aux souhaits de maître Bellardo, il a été totalement dépourvu de libre arbitre, et les zones de son cerveau contrôlant le plaisir ont été détruites... mais ses souvenirs et sa conscience ont été majoritairement préservés ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, this is a rare, one-of-a-kind unit! Commissioned personally by Master Bellardo twelve years ago! The main function of this servitor is cleaning the house, bedrooms, vestibules, bathrooms... In accordance with Master Bellardo's wishes, its free will was completely eradicated, and the parts of its brain that regulated pleasure responses were destroyed... but to a large extent, its memory and awareness were preserved!"

Conformément aux souhaits de maître Bellardo, il a été totalement dépourvu de libre arbitre, et les zones de son cerveau contrôlant le plaisir ont été détruites... mais ses souvenirs et sa conscience ont été majoritairement préservés ! »

languages.text: "Bu, çok nadir ve eşsiz bir birim! Üstat Bellardo tarafından on iki yıl önce bizzat yaptırılmış! Bu hizmetörün ana görevi; evi, yatak odalarını, holü ve banyoları temizlemekmiş. Üstat Bellardo'nun isteği üzerine hür iradesi tamamen silinmiş ve beyninin zevkleri algılamasını sağlayan kısımları yok edilmiş. Fakat belleği ve farkındalığı büyük ölçüde korunmuş!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, this is a rare, one-of-a-kind unit! Commissioned personally by Master Bellardo twelve years ago! The main function of this servitor is cleaning the house, bedrooms, vestibules, bathrooms... In accordance with Master Bellardo's wishes, its free will was completely eradicated, and the parts of its brain that regulated pleasure responses were destroyed... but to a large extent, its memory and awareness were preserved!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu, çok nadir ve eşsiz bir birim! Üstat Bellardo tarafından in iki yıl önce şahsen atanmış! Bu servitörün ana görevi evi, yatak odalarını, holü ve banyoları temizlemekmiş. Üstat Bellardo'nun isteği üzerine hür iradesi tamamen elinden alınmış ve beyninin zevkleri algılamasını sağlayan bazı kısımları yok edilmiş. Fakat genel olarak belleği ve farkındalığı korunmuş!"
